channel.title: Why does this happen when...?
channel.description:
Basically, Im the only one on my server, webclient all set up and everything, i log in and it's all fine..
But when it comes to someone else logging in.. I get something coming up saying "connection lost, attemping to reestablish" and then my computer messes up so i have to restart it to get it back to normal again, but it does this everytime someone logs in.
Does anyone know the problem or how to fix this from stop happening.
Thanks for your time :eek:

item.title: Why does this happen when...?
item.dc:creator: @fallenlegend fallenlegend
item.description:
@fallenlegend wrote:

Native^:

webclient = client, lol.

If he’s using PI and downloaded the Pack, then it comes with 3 different Folders, Webclient, client, and source. They all have different coding…

Read full topic

item.description:
@fallenlegend wrote:

What source are you using, what client are you using, and what webclient are you using.
